title: Miranda Kerr’s ‘Marilyn’ moment
text:
Supermodel Miranda Kerr sizzles as screen siren, Marilyn Monroe Nadia Salemme News Corp Australia Network Supermodel Miranda Kerr sizzles as screen siren, Marilyn Monroe Nadia Salemme News Corp Australia Network Blonde ambition ... Miranda Kerr as Marilyn Monroe. Picture: Instagram 
WEARING a peroxide blonde wig and statement red lips, supermodel Miranda Kerr has done her best Marilyn Monroe impression by dressing up as the Hollywood siren. 
The Aussie beauty, 32, wore a white halter dress and was draped in diamonds and pearls a la Monroe’s famous role in The Seven Year Itch . 
Kerr - who is dating Snapchat chief executive Evan Spiegel - appeared to don the costume for a Halloween party, posting the photos on Instagram. RED HOT
